Every apartment home is pet friendly, features over-sized closets, and gourmet-style kitchens. Additionally, Gatewater Landing offers top-rated customer service, such as our 24-hour Maintenance and On-Site Management. Call Gatewater Landing today to speak with a member of our sales team and schedule a tour. We offer Preferred Employer and Military Discounts!

Description: You'll enjoy taking in the spectacular scenery and much more at Village Square Townhomes and Apartments! Our two- and three-bedroom townhomes and one- and two-bedroom apartments for rent in Glen Burnie, MD have central air and separate dining rooms. Select homes offer a renovated kitchen and bath, frost-free refrigerator (some with icemaker), washer and dryer, walk-in closets, private entrances and a balcony or patio. You'll also enjoy our swimming pool, playground, dog run, clubhouse, business and fitness centers, and on-site laundry facilities. * Located in the Anne Arundel County School District, Village Square is minutes from Arundel Mills Mall, one of the largest shopping areas in the country. Assigned parking is available. Military clause honored. Cats and dogs are welcome.

Description:
Like new spacious and luxurious townhome built in 2010. Has 3Br, 2 Full BA, 2 half BA, approx. 2400 sq ft townhouse available immediately, for rent in the new Tanyard Springs community. Features include:
* Spacious open floor plan having three bedrooms and two full baths on top level. One powder room on main level, and one half bath in finished basement.
* Open floor plan on main level combines the living room, dining area, sitting area, powder room, Kitchen with stainless steel appliances and island on main level. Glass tile backsplash and under/over cabinet lighting provides cozy ambiance for entertaining.
* A huge master bedroom with vaulted ceilings, a large walk-in closet, and en-suite bathroom with soaking tub, standup shower and a double sink vanity.
* Main level and basement has been prewired for a clutter-free entertainment system. Main level has in-ceiling speakers in every room and the deck has been prewired for speakers as well.
* A spacious finished basement with a walkout to the woods
* Elegant crown molding and chair rail throughout
* Large 20ftX14ft maintenance-free deck with furniture and white railing, great for families and entertaining
* Very near Fort Meade, NSA, Dorsey train station, BWI train station, Rt 100, 295, & 695, perfect for commuting to Baltimore or Washington.
* Very close to shopping and dining.
* End unit with many additional windows and a large bay window in breakfast nook which lets in tons of natural sunlight
Tenant responsible for all utilities used including, electric, water, gas, internet, phone, cable.

Description: Gorgeous rental in the heart of Old Glen Burnie. House has been totally renovated and features a huge garage/workshop with space for 4 cars and access off the alley. Fresh paint new carpet throughout brand new kitchen and bath. Large family room opens to deck and fenced yard. 3BR s on main with a 4th on the upper level. Larger than it looks! No pets no groups. Previous rental history required

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator
* Breakfast Nook

Description: Spacious Home! Living Room Dining Room Kitchen Family Room Main Level Bedroom 2nd & possible 3rd bedroom upstairs Carpet and hardwood floors. Separate Laundry & Storage Rooms. Enclosed rear porch and LARGE privacy fenced yard with shed. Driveway in rear of home. Near I695 I97 I95 & light rail. Near shopping restaurants great location! No Pets or Smokers. Not accepting vouchers.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description: This endunit townhome shows great! Freshly painted interior and brand new carpeting throughout. Gourmet kitchen with hardwood flooring center island & stainless steel appliances. Large custom deck off kitchen lovely brick patio of family room in lower level. Master bedroom suite w/ master bath with soaking tub & separate shower. Double car garage. Community center pool & more. Huge Reduction!

Description:
(443) 522-4855 - Wonderful Updated 3BR/2.5BA SFH in Glen Burnie, MD (40 and older) - $200.00 Off 1 Month’s Rent if Moved In by October 1st!!
Wonderful Updated 3BR/2.5BA SFH in Glen Burnie, MD. Features rich hardwood flooring and crown molding throughout a spacious living room, formal dining room, ½ bath, tiled sun room (fully enclosed), “great room” with cathedral ceilings, working propane fireplace. Large eat in kitchen features gorgeous granite countertops including breakfast island/breakfast bar, tiled floors, separate breakfast nook, and all appliances including dual oven and dishwasher. First floor also has a ½ bath, laundry area with washer/dryer included, full hall bath with tiled floors, and tiled tub enclosure. Home has 3 spacious bedrooms with plenty of closet storage space including a large master bedroom with walk in closet and fully updated master bath with his/her vanity, tiled soaker tub and separate walk in shower. Fully finished basement clubroom has a pool table included as well as 2 separate finished rooms that would make great guest bedrooms or home office space and an unfinished storage area. Spacious backyard with deck for entertaining that backs up to protected wooded area for privacy ALL LAWN CARE INCLUDED!
Pets under 50lbs considered on a case by case basis (No Cats) with an additional Pet Deposit!!
Over 40 community that backs up to “Marley Creek”. Tenants must be at least 42 and neighborhood does not allow kids under 18.
Contact JC Solorzano at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
No Cats Allowed
(RLNE3477705) Other Amenities - Other- hardwood floors, great room, sunroom, fireplace, granite countertops, breakfast bar, custom tiled floors, dual ovens, walk in closet, dual vanity, basement clubroom, pool table, Deck. Appliances - Dishwasher, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(443) 522-4855 - Newly Updated 3BR/1BA End of Row TH in Millersville, MD - $200.00 Off 1 Month’s Rent if Moved In by October 1st!!
Newly Updated 3 Bedroom 1 Full Bathroom End of Row Townhome in Millersville, MD. Features gorgeous laminate hardwood flooring throughout a spacious living room, laundry area with stackable washer/dryer included. Fully updated kitchen/dining room combo features updated cabinets, updated countertops and all stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and gas stove. Second floor has 3 spacious bedrooms including a master bedroom with walk in closet and an updated full hall bath with tiled floors and updated fixtures. Home has a spacious patio that backs up to playground perfect for entertaining. Playground, pool access, and lawn care are all included!
Pets under 20lbs considered on a case by case basis with an additional Pet Deposit!!
Contact JC Solorzano at (703) 825-0957 for details or to schedule an appointment or email jsolorzano@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3461596) Other Amenities - Other- stainless steel appliances, custom tiled floors, playground, Pool, Patio. Appliances - Dishwasher, Air Conditioning, Range, Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

(410) 562-3889 - Rare 2 Car Garage Townhome! Military take $100 off first months Rent! - Move In October 1
Rare opportunity to rent a large 3 bedroom Townhome with 2 Car garage. 
Features include:
Huge Upper level master suite with master bath (separate Jetted tub and shower); All bedrooms are very spacious and feature walk-n closets. The master and bedroom #2 also have additional closets, providing ample storage. 
Home also Features a deck/balcony off of the main living room and a lower level family room for added entertainment. 
Community Amenities include, common areas, playground and community swimming pool. 
All Adults must have credit scores of 650 or higher and fill out separate lease applications. 
Contact your Favorite REALTOR to show this wonderful home. MLS #AA10067416
No Dogs Allowed
(RLNE2585877) Pet policies - Cats Allowed, No Dogs Allowed.

Updated Pergo floors, stainless steel appliances, tons of cabinet & counter space in the kitchen, fun chalkboard wall in the living room & main level half bath. Close to routes 32,97,100 and Ft. Meade. No smoking!Will consider your pet!

Description:
(240) 778-3264 - Beautiful 3BR/1BA SFH in Glen Burnie, MD - Beautiful 3BR/1BA Single Family Home in Glen Burnie, MD. The house features a spacious living room with exposed brick accent wall, separate dining room with new laminate hardwood flooring and well maintained kitchen with electric stove and plenty of cabinet space! There are 3 spacious bedrooms with ceiling fans and plenty of closet space as well as a full bath that has a new shower enclosure and updated fixtures. The house has a large storage area, separate laundry area with washer/dryer included new ceiling fans/light fixtures throughout and a large 2 car parking pad. The best part of this house is the outdoor space! There is a spacious front yard with gorgeous garden beds, HUGE fenced in backyard for entertaining with storage shed and a separate outdoor dog kennel that is going to be very convenient for dog owners!! VERY PET FRIENDLY, freshly painted exterior, oil furnace with baseboard heaters and window a/c units.
Pets considered on a case by case basis with additional Pet Deposit!!
Contact Adriane at (410) 279-8910 for details or to schedule an appointment or email adicamillo@baymgmtgroup.com
You can apply for this unit or get more information at our website http://www.baymgmtgroup.com/laurel-md-rental-listings/laurel-single-family/
Good Credit Score required. Any slightly lower scores will be considered on a case by case basis.
(RLNE3242940) Other Amenities - Other- ceiling fans, fully equipped kitchen, detached storage shed, Yard. Appliances - Washer & Dryer. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed, Large Dogs Allowed.

Description:
(410) 902-1100 - Spacious Garage Townhome in Glen Burnie - Spacious end-of-group garage townhome in Cromwell Fountain is totally neutral throughout & drenched in natural light. Expansive living room opens to a modern eat-in kitchen w/center island, cooktop, wall oven and tons of cabinet & counter space. The private owners’ suite features a sitting area and luxury bath w/ soaking tub & separate shower. Spacious bedrooms with lots of closet space. Finished lower level has den w/ wood floors and attached 2-car garage. The large deck is perfect for a summer BBQ! Close to shopping, restaurants and major commuter routes.
(RLNE3427250) Other Amenities - Other- wood floors, end-of-group, eat-in kichen, island, breakfast bar, private owners' suite, luxury bath, soaking tub, separate shower, spacious bedrooms, closet space, den, Garage, Deck. Appliances - Range, Oven.

Description: Northern Anne Arundel County - centrally located with easy access to I-97, I-695, Route 100, Harbor Tunnel, Key Bridge, Baltimore Washington Parkway; MVA within walking distance, shopping centers (Target, WalMart, specialty shops) and major food stores (Shop Rite, Food Lion, and Giant Food) within walking distance, places of worship within walking distance, MTA bus service within walking distance, very close to Baltimore Inner Harbor, Annapolis, Washington D.C., Maryland Live at Arundel Mills, close to numerous fitness centers and gyms. Schools include Hilltop Elementary, Lindale Middle, and North County High.

Description: Enjoy carefree retirement living at Glen Forest, an affordable senior apartment community for seniors 62 and older. Located in a nicely landscaped setting, Glen Forest is highlighted by the latest conveniences. Each spacious one and two-bedroom apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, roomy closets and a balcony or patio. You can exercise the mind in the library, or the body in our fitness center. Keypad entry and the emergency response system provide peace of mind. The atmosphere at Glen Forest is filled with gracious living. Here, you will appreciate not having to worry about maintenance chores. At the same time, you can take advantage of our on-site services or the nearby shops, library, park, and public transportation. Glen Forest offers all the elements of an exceptional lifestyle. Our recreation program is filled with popular social events to share with friends, comprehensive exercise activities that focus on health and wellness and exciting opportunities for lifelong learning.

Description: Hammarlee House is a thriving, smoke-free community that more than 55 seniors call home. As you enter the lobby of Hammarlee House, you are greeted by the tranquil weeping wall, water feature. This wall sets the tone for the Hammarlee House community. We offer adults, age 62 and over, beautiful, one and two bedroom apartment homes featuring energy-star appliances, dishwashers, disposals, microwaves, high-speed internet access, and washer/dryer hook-ups. Health conscious residents can take brisk daily walks around the walking path that surrounds the community or workout with the state-of-the-art equipment in the fitness center. For the technically-inclined, you can grab an iPad in the cyber café, a cup of coffee, and spend an hour or two surfing the web. Do you have a “green thumb”? Then you might want to grow your own vegetables or flowers in the greenhouse. Movie buffs can enjoy the on-site movie theater that comes with an old-fashioned popcorn machine; or you might gather a few friends to shoot some pool in the billiards room; or relax in the 50s-themed clubroom, which features an authentic diner-style lunch counter. Residents can read a good book while rocking on the front porch or enjoy an evening picnic on the outdoor teak furniture. In addition, the dayroom is the perfect place for yoga and meditating. To make sure you’re ready for your special evening, Hammarlee House comes equipped with a full service beauty salon.
